## defaultGetOptionLabel() function

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

A default function for getting the option label string in the `CountryCodeSelector`<!-- -->'s `Autocomplete` component. See [https://mui.com/material-ui/api/autocomplete/\#autocomplete-prop-getOptionLabel](https://mui.com/material-ui/api/autocomplete/#autocomplete-prop-getOptionLabel) for more information about the `getOptionLabel` prop.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function defaultGetOptionLabel(option: CountryType): string;
```

[CountryType](./mui-country-code-selector.countrytype.md)

**Returns:**
